steps.title: Left-sided arranged book page
steps.description: In the initial state, the book page arranged on the left side is not present and can get associated with a placeholder's representation.

steps.title: Right-sided book page
steps.description: The book page on the right represents the original content or message stream a digital platform communicates to the user.

steps.title: Behavior
steps.description: Modify the format of display and presentation of any elements included in the existing content and message stream. Supplementary elements entering the display area are linked to the opposite book page's existing components, keeping the publication time sequence. The modification of the display and presentation format gets carried out during the use of a target application, solely on the user's end device.
